Posts.Content: tpot3 wrote: Hi!  I'm new here.  Maybe I have overlooked it, but I am looking for others who are starting chemo this August.  I just had my first treatment on 8/17. Dx 6/21/2012, ILC, 2cm, Stage IIIA, Grade 1, 4/19 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Anyone starting chemo in August 2012? tpot3 melmcbee
